units.title: Generate neural organoids in 96-well plates
units.text: Neural organoids were generated in 96-well plates, where pluripotent stem cells (WTC, H9 and HES3 lines; the latter modified to report the expression of the regional marker NKX2-1) were aggregated into embryoid bodies and cultured in minimal neural induction media (MNIM) to induce neuroectodermal fates (Fig. 1a).
units.rationale: This is a clear, actionable protocol step describing the initial setup of organoid culture.

units.title: Apply morphogen treatments with varying timing, concentration, and combination
units.text: Developing organoids were then subjected to a panel of morphogen treatments with varying timing, concentration and combination of the molecules CHIR99021 (CHIR, WNT pathway activator), XAV939 (WNT pathway inhibitor), rh-SHH/CS24II (SHH) and purmorphamine, FGF-8B (FGF8), RA, rhBMP-4 (BMP4), rhBMP-7 (BMP7)
units.rationale: This describes a systematic experimental protocol for applying morphogens with defined parameters.

units.title: Dissociate and hash organoid cells for scRNA-seq
units.text: each condition (Supplementary Fig. 1) were pooled and dissociated into single-cell suspensions, followed by cell hashing with barcoded antibodies25 and processing for single-cell transcriptome sequencing (3′ mRNA, 10x Genomics; Fig. 1b).
units.rationale: This is a precise, step-by-step procedure for preparing samples for single-cell sequencing.

units.title: Analyze cell-type composition using Shannon diversity index
units.text: We measured the heterogeneity of each patterning condition using the Shannon diversity index, where lower scores indicate lower cell-type diversity.
units.rationale: This specifies a quantitative method for assessing cell-type diversity in response to treatments.

units.title: Calculate cluster enrichment/depletion scores for morphogen effects
units.text: To identify effects of each morphogen at the cell-type level, we calculated cluster enrichment/depletion scores for each treatment (Fig. 2a–c, Extended Data Figs. 3a–k and 4a,b and Supplementary Table 3).
units.rationale: This outlines a defined analytical protocol to quantify morphogen impact on cell clusters.

units.title: Perform in situ hybridization chain reaction (HCR) staining
units.text: In situ hybridization chain reaction (HCR) stainings confirmed the presence of more retinal progenitors (SFRP2+) at lower RA concentrations and more ventralized and posterior fates (FOXA2+) at higher RA concentrations (Fig. 2d and Extended Data Fig. 3l,m).
units.rationale: This is a specific validation protocol using HCR staining to confirm molecular outcomes.

units.title: Use microfluidic chips or multi-well plates for morphogen delivery
units.text: We apply concentration gradients in microfluidic chips or increasing static concentrations in multi-well plates and observe different patterning dynamics in each scenario.
units.rationale: This describes two distinct experimental setups for morphogen delivery with observable outcomes.

units.title: Integrate scRNA-seq data using RSS and UMAP
units.text: We integrated the data using reference similarity spectrum (RSS)27 comparison to an early developing human brain cell atlas ref. 28 and embedded the dataset with uniform manifold approximation and guided projection (UMAP)29 (Fig. 1c–e).
units.rationale: This is a standardized computational protocol for processing and visualizing single-cell transcriptomic data.
